fire_cracker.name: Fire Cracker
fire_cracker.description: A firecracker is a small explosive device primarily designed to produce a large amount of noise.

m80_firecracker.name: M80 Firecracker
m80_firecracker.description: M-80s are an American class of large powerful firecrackers, sometimes called salutes.

bottle_rocket.name: Bottle Rocket
bottle_rocket.description: A bottle rocket is a small skyrocket. A typical bottle rocket consists of a rocket engine attached to a stabilizing stick.

roman_candle.name: Roman Candle
roman_candle.description: A Roman candle is a traditional type of firework that ejects one or more stars or exploding shells.

fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

cake_sparklers.name: Cake Sparklers
cake_sparklers.description: The perfect addition to make your loved one's birthday more special than it already is.

aerial_fireworks.name: Aerial Fireworks
aerial_fireworks.description: These items are chain-fused fireworks that propel a series of aerial shells, comets or mines into the air from collectively attached tubes to produce various colors, noises, and effects.

beehive.name: Beehive
beehive.description: A visual effect of color stars that actively are swarming around which illuminates into a visual Beehive appearance.

comet.name: Comet
comet.description: A star or fiery ball which emits a thick trail of sparks on the way up, following the star or ball and eventually burns out or fades away. These are sometimes added to a shell basically chasing the shell up until it breaks.

dynamite.name: Dynamite
dynamite.description: An explosive made by soaking an inert (inactive or stable), absorbent substance with a mixture of (1) nitroglycerin or ammonium nitrate, (2) a combustible substance (a substance with the ability to burn), such as wood pulp, and (3) an antacid.

gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
gunpowder.description: An explosive mixture of charcoal, potassium nitrate, and sulfur often used to propel bullets from guns and shells from cannons.

nuclear_explosive.name: Nuclear Explosives
nuclear_explosive.description: A device that obtains its explosive force from the release of nuclear energy.

hand_grenade.name: Hand Grenade
hand_grenade.description: A grenade is a small bomb typically thrown by hand.

c_4.name: C-4
c_4.description: C-4 is composed of explosives, plastic binder, plasticizer to make it malleable, and usually a marker or odorizing taggant chemical.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: A smoke bomb is a firework designed to produce smoke upon ignition.

nitroglycerin.name: Nitroglycerin
nitroglycerin.description: The first explosive discovered to be stronger than black poweder.

black_powder.name: Black Powder
black_powder.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.
